placeholderEncoded: Here will be the encoded text %2F Put the encoded text here.
placeholderDecoded: Here will be the decoded text / Put the decoded text here.
toolsBase64Description: Translates a string into and from base64 encoding.
toolsUrlEncodingDescription: Translates a string into and from URL encoding.
toolsDocumentScannerDescription: Uses the camera to scan a document, morphs it to a rectangle and converts it into a PDF.
toolsFlashlightDescription: Uses the camera light as flashlight / torch.
